selectRepeats: select * from %s where id like '%s' or id like '%s' or id like '%s' or id like '%s' or id like '%s' or id like '%s' or id like '%s' or id like '%s' or id like '%s' or id like '%s' limit 10
selectAndSort: select * from test order by id desc
createNewRowInAuthor: insert into author (name, login, email) values ('%s', '%s', '%s')
selectRandomIdFromAuthor: select id from author order by RAND()
